mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
INSERT INTO pa_paper (id, create_date, title, paper_type, publish, paper_time, re_do, score, refer_answer, subject_code, publish_code, grade_code, volume_code, unit_code, section_code, user_id, difficulity, book_id, book_unit_id, book_section_id, knowledge, uuid, modify_date) VALUES (#{id}, #{createDate}, #{title}, #{paperType}, #{publish}, #{paperTime}, #{reDo}, #{score}, #{referAnswer}, #{subjectCode}, #{publishCode}, #{gradeCode}, #{volumeCode}, #{unitCode}, #{sectionCode}, #{userId}, #{difficulity}, #{bookId}, #{bookUnitId}, #{bookSectionId}, #{knowledge}, #{uuid}, #{modifyDate})
mapper.update:
UPDATE pa_paper SET
create_date=#{createDate},
title=#{title},
paper_type=#{paperType},
publish=#{publish},
paper_time=#{paperTime},
re_do=#{reDo},
score=#{score},
refer_answer=#{referAnswer},
subject_code=#{subjectCode},
publish_code=#{publishCode},
grade_code=#{gradeCode},
volume_code=#{volumeCode},
unit_code=#{unitCode},
section_code=#{sectionCode},
user_id=#{userId},
difficulity=#{difficulity},
book_id=#{bookId},
book_unit_id=#{bookUnitId},
book_section_id=#{bookSectionId},
knowledge=#{knowledge},
uuid=#{uuid},
modify_date=#{modifyDate},
id = #{id} WHERE id = #{id}
